name: Drift Showcase
description:
Drift Showcase : side scrolling drifting experience


Welcome to the Showcase Arena where your only task is to impress the crowd by doing the greatest drift show !


  • Built on Unreal Engine 5
  • Showcase your skill, perform stunts and slides to impress the crowd, gather more fans and get on top of the leaderboard

  • Awesome Graphics
  • Awesome Cars
  • Visual tuning
  • Custom Vehicle Physics

  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Leaderboards

  • Controller support for drifting
